name: array-to-tree
description: Convert a plain array of nodes (with pointers to parent nodes) to a tree

scripts.release: npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m ":octocat: Bump to $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git tag $(cat package.json | jq -r .version) && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
